/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the surroundings. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. A solitary figure can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the otherwise still image. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The overall mood of the image is peaceful and serene, inviting the viewer to take a moment and appreciate the beauty of the everyday.
